mapper.select: select distinct ams.ams_exam_answer.examId,ams.ams_exam_answer.short_answer,ams.short_question.referenceanswer,ams.ams_exam.shortId, ams.ams_exam_answer.id,ams.user.uid, ams.ams_exam_answer.userId,ams.user.username,ams.user.name, ams.exam_subject.subjectName, ams.score.totalShortScore from ams.ams_exam_answer inner join ams.user on ams.user.uid = ams.ams_exam_answer.userId inner join ams.score on ams.ams_exam_answer.userId = ams.score.uid inner join ams.exam_subject on ams.ams_exam_answer.subjectId = ams.exam_subject.subjectId inner join ams.ams_exam on ams.ams_exam.examNum = ams.ams_exam_answer.examNum inner join ams.short_question on ams.short_question.id = ams.ams_exam.shortId where ams.ams_exam_answer.status = 1

select ams.ams_exam_answer.short_answer,ams.exam_subject.subjectName, ams.score.totalShortScore, ams.exam_subject.subjectName from ams.ams_exam_answer inner join ams.score on ams.score.uid = ams.ams_exam_answer.userId inner join ams.exam_subject on ams.ams_exam_answer.subjectId = ams.exam_subject.subjectId where ams.ams_exam_answer.userId = #{userId} and ams.ams_exam_answer.examId = #{examId}
mapper.update: update ams.ams_exam_answer,ams.score set ams.score.totalShortScore = #{totalShortScore}, ams.ams_exam_answer.status = 0 where ams.ams_exam_answer.userId = ams.score.uid
